options.name: Leader
options.description: You are a natural leader who inspires others to follow your guidance through both your commanding presence and your willingness to face danger first. Your leadership manifests in your readiness to take initiative, set examples, and make difficult decisions that others shy away from. You value courage, responsibility, and strategic thinking above all else.

options.name: Take the Initiative
options.description: You are the first to act, often to set an example. Gain +1 skill with coordination. On the first round of combat, you gain a bonus dice to all your actions.

options.name: Natural Born Leader
options.description: You are born to lead and find it easy to get people to do your bidding. Gain +1 skill with persuasion. Once per day, you can replace any insight check with a persuasion check.

options.name: Commanding Presence
options.description: Your leadership abilities are enhanced by your commanding presence. Gain +1 skill with presence. Whenever you spend a Wonder, roll a presence check; a result of 7 or higher removes the Woe from any ally within a short (10 unit) radius.

options.name: Daily Action : To the Death
options.description: While at 0 health, you lead by example and show your bravery, rolling a presence check. You and all allies within a short (10 unit) radius gain morale gain 5 morale.

options.name: Action : Rally
options.description: You attempt to rally your allies that can hear you to your position by calling out or blowing a horn. Until the start of your next turn, the free movement speed of your allies is doubled when they are moving towards you or an enemy that you are adjacent to.

options.name: A Leader's Sacrifice
options.description: Your maximum morale is decreased by 5. At the end of a full rest, you can sacrifice any amount of your current morale to grant that same amount to each ally within a short (10 unit) distance.

options.name: Tactical Reposition
options.description: At the start of combat, during the preparation phase, you can reposition up to three allies up to 2 units if they have the ability to move. When you designate a spot to move, the ally can either accept or decline your suggestion. This movement does not provoke reactions.

options.name: Downtime Action : Rousing Speech
options.description: You spend time writing and performing a speech to either raise spirits or move someone to your opinion, with an audience suitable for your reputation. A presence check of 6-9 is mildly successful, granting 5 morale to all who hear it. A check of 10 or higher is very successful and 10 morale and may be more likely to move others to your belief. In the event of a perfect check, all who hear become charmed by you for an hour or until it breaks naturally.
